component.name: Jami GNOME
component.summary: A free and universal communication platform preserving user's privacy and freedoms

description.p: Jami is a secure and distributed file transfer, voice, video and chat communication platform that requires no centralized server and leaves the power of privacy in the hands of the user. For compatiblity with existing network infrastructure a SIP client is included.
Some of the many features offered by Jami:

ul.li: Audio and video calls and messages, instant messaging, file transfers
High-quality 4K video streaming and screen sharing
Teleconferencing with a unlimited number of participants
Distributed architecture â€” P2P connections, DHT for a peer discovery
Also available for Windows, macOS, iOS, Android and Android TV
